title: Hiragana Quiz - Set 3
description: Test your knowledge of hiragana characters with this quiz. Identify the correct hiragana character for each given pronunciation.

items.question: な
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a diagonal line and a short horizontal line.

items.question: に
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'ni' with a curve at the top.

items.question: ぬ
items.hint: Looks like the letter 'nu' with a curve at the top.

items.question: ね
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a long diagonal line and a short horizontal line.

items.question: の
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a circle and a short line coming out from the right.

items.question: は
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'ha' with a curve at the top.

items.question: ひ
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a short horizontal line and a longer diagonal line.

items.question: ふ
items.hint: Looks like the letter 'fu' with a curve at the top.

items.question: へ
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a short horizontal line and a curve.

items.question: ほ
items.hint: Combination of three strokes: a vertical line, a curve, and a short line.
